Geva-May ____ Pal ( 1999 ) says ____ it ____ to ____ the ____ method, target ____ and ____ tools, but ____ avoid ____ results. The ____ of ____ policy ____ finish ____ part ____ the ____. Since evaluation is primarily retrospective, it looks at context in terms of factors that facilitated or impeded policy success.
data.partBlankContent: Therefore, what is the evaluation's problem definition? Geva-May a__ Pal ( 1999 ) says th__ it i_ to dete_____ the rese____ method, target popul_____ and rese____ tools, but partic______ avoid predi_____ results. The ana____ of pub___ policy sho___ finish th__ part o_ the wo__. Since evaluation is primarily retrospective, it looks at context in terms of factors that facilitated or impeded policy success.
data.fullContent: Therefore, what is the evaluation's problem definition? Geva-May and Pal ( 1999 ) says that it is to determine the research method, target population and research tools, but particularly avoid predicting results. The analyst of public policy should finish this part of the work. Since evaluation is primarily retrospective, it looks at context in terms of factors that facilitated or impeded policy success.
data.answer: 因此，评价的问题定义是什么？Geva-May和Pal(1999)认为，它是为了确定研究方法、目标人群和研究工具，但特别避免预测结果。公共政策分析师应该完成这部分工作。由于评价主要是回顾性的，它根据促进或阻碍政策成功的因素来审查背景。
